mapper.select: select rp.project_id, rp.project_name, rp.project_content, rp.funding, rp.start_date, rp.complete_date, s.superintendent_id as s_superintendent_id, s.name as s_name, s.office_phone as s_office_phone, s.mobile_phone as s_mobile_phone, s.email as s_email, c.client_name as c_client_name, c.address as c_address, c.superintendent_id as c_superintendent_id, qm.quality_monitor_name as qm_quality_monitor_name, qm.address as qm_address, qm.superintendent_id as qm_superintendent_id, c2.collaborator_name as c2_collaborator_name, c2.address as c2_address, c2.superintendent_id as c2_superintendent_id from research_project rp left join superintendent s on rp.superintendent_id = s.superintendent_id left join client c on rp.client_name = c.client_name left join quality_monitor qm on rp.quality_monitor_name = qm.quality_monitor_name left join project_collaborator pc on rp.project_id = pc.project_id left join collaborator c2 on pc.collaborator_name = c2.collaborator_name where rp.project_id = #{projectId}

select s.subtopic_num, s.subtopic_content, s.available_funding, s.complete_deadline_date, s.technical_indicator, s2.superintendent_id as s2_superintendent_id, s2.name as s2_name, s2.office_phone as s2_office_phone, s2.mobile_phone as s2_mobile_phone, s2.email as s2_email, sr.researcher_id as sr_researcher_id, sr.name as sr_name from research_project rp left join subtopic s on rp.project_id = s.project_id left join superintendent s2 on s.superintendent_id = s2.superintendent_id left join researcher_project r on rp.project_id = r.project_id and s.subtopic_num = r.subtopic_num left join scientific_researcher sr on r.researcher_id = sr.researcher_id where rp.project_id = #{projectId}

select r.researcher_id, name, title, lab_name, join_date, work_hour, available_funding from research_project rp left join researcher_project r on rp.project_id = r.project_id left join scientific_researcher sr on r.researcher_id = sr.researcher_id where rp.project_id = #{projectId}

select ra.achievement_id, ra.achievement_name, ra.acquisition_date, ra.achievement_type, ra.patent_type, ra.project_id, rp.project_name, ra2.rank as ra2_rank, ra2.researcher_id as ra2_researcher_id, sr.name as sr_name from research_project rp left join research_achievement ra on rp.project_id = ra.project_id left join researcher_achievement ra2 on ra.achievement_id = ra2.achievement_id left join scientific_researcher sr on ra2.researcher_id = sr.researcher_id where rp.project_id = #{projectId}
